title: Armstrong and Edgerton on Aftermath of GOP Health Bill (Audio)
itunes:title: Armstrong and Edgerton on Aftermath of GOP Health Bill (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Bloomberg News Reporters Drew Armstrong and Anna Edgerton, discuss the aftermath of the GOP health bill voted on Thursday. They speak with June Grasso and Michael Best on "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
